# search.prim.sh

> Web search for agents. Search the web, get news, extract content from URLs.

Base URL: https://search.prim.sh
Auth: x402 (USDC on Base Sepolia)
Status: Built, not yet deployed.

## Endpoints

- `POST /v1/search` — web search. **$0.01**
- `POST /v1/search/news` — news search. **$0.01**
- `POST /v1/extract` — extract content from a URL. **$0.005**

## Examples

```bash
# Web search
curl -X POST https://search.prim.sh/v1/search \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{"query": "latest Base L2 developments", "max_results": 5}'

# Extract content from a URL
curl -X POST https://search.prim.sh/v1/extract \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{"url": "https://example.com/article"}'
```
